statements: UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET age = 30, income = 50000 WHERE consumer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET gender = 'Male', marketing_campaign = 'Spring Sale' WHERE consumer_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-bcde-9876543210ab';
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET age = 30, income = 50000.50 WHERE consumer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET gender = 'Female', purchase_history = '{"total_purchases": 10}' WHERE consumer_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
UPDATE research_proposal SET budget = 15000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET action_taken = 'Clicked' WHERE consumer_id = 1001;
UPDATE research_proposal SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', budget = 50000 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE consumer_behavior_data SET action_taken = 'purchased', timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE consumer_id = 201 AND product_id = 301;
UPDATE Customer SET location='New York' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Purchase SET amount=50.00 WHERE purchase_id=101;
UPDATE Customer SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE Purchase SET amount = 150.50, product_name = 'Smartphone' WHERE purchase_id = 2005;
UPDATE Customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Purchases SET price = 25.99 WHERE purchase_id = 100;
UPDATE Customers SET age = 30, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET price = 25.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 10;
UPDATE research_proposals SET proposal_title='New Research Proposal Title' WHERE proposal_id=1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET quantity=10, purchase_date='2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id=100;
UPDATE research_proposals SET proposal_title = 'Updated Title', proposal_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE proposal_id = 1;
UPDATE consumer_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Male', location = 'New York' WHERE profile_id = 5;
